attributes.action: Make changes regarding the upcoming  ban on XL Bullies .
attributes.additional_details:
To look again at the upcoming ban on these poor dogs.
Why destroy a healthy animal dog attacks have been happening for years with all breeds.Humans do a lot worse and spend time in prison fed and watered and most get a second chance not a death sentence.
Why not let the dogs that are here through no fault of their own have the chance to live a happy life and get homed.
Make it law that they can not breed and have to be neutered and where a muzzle but please don’t sentence them to death .
attributes.background:
Look again at the ban regarding XL Bullies.
Make changes that give them a chance to be homed and loved .
No death sentence for humans so why for these poor dogs . 
It actually breaks my heart that a few people in power can make such unfair decisions.
What breed will be next ?

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Delay the ban on rehoming and owning XL Bully dogs for 18 months: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650474

Review and reform arrangements for ban on XL Bully type dogs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652260
